alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:46AM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Locally higher amounts possible in the Tushar Mountains and Manti- La Sal Skyline area. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...The snow will result in winter driving conditions through this evening. Use caution when traveling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
